description: Lists applications based on a set of parameters.

parameters.name: states
parameters.description: An optional filter for application states. Note that if this filter contains multiple states, the resulting list will be grouped by the state. (string) ---

nested_items.name: applications
nested_items.description: The output lists the specified applications.

nested_items.name: releaseLabel
nested_items.description: The Amazon EMR release associated with the application.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of application, such as Spark or Hive.

nested_items.name: stateDetails
nested_items.description: The state details of the application.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the application was created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the application was last updated.

nested_items.name: architecture
nested_items.description: The CPU architecture of an application.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The output displays the token for the next set of application results. This is required for pagination and is available as a response of the previous request.
